body.name: WOODBRIDGEE One Piece Toilet with Soft Closing Seat, Chair Height, 1.28 GPF Dual, Water Sensed, 1000 Gram MaP Flushing Score Toilet with Chrome Button T0001-CH, White
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
features: [CHAIR HEIGHT DESIGN]:WOODBRIDGE chair height toilet not only meets ADA standards, must have a 17-19" floor to bowl rim height with seat included, but also offer more comfort to taller people and people who have a hard time getting up from a low seat.

[EASY TO CLEAN]:With a completely smooth, easy to wipe down surface. With our fully concealed trap-way, there are no bends or corners to gather dust. Also, no large mounting holes or ugly plastic caps to be seen.

[Chrome BUTTON]:A timeless, sophisticated and flattering Chrome-plated top button is included, the flat will bringing out the shimmer of brass and other metal and is perfectly pair with your home's metalic elements.
[QUITE & POWERFUL FLUSHING]:Siphon Flushing one piece toilet, Fully glazed flush system , bringing a super quiet and powerful flushing - NO clogs, NO leaks, and NO problem
[Map Flush 1000 Grams]:Best Maximum Performance Flush score of 1000 grams. Highly Recommended Map Scoring Toilet
[TOP QUALITY SEAT]:High end Soft Closing Toilet Seat with Stainless Steel Durable Seat Hinge, Easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean after years of use.
[LUXURIOUS MODERN DESIGN]:Luxurious Modern Design one piece toilet , Clean, sleek look and compliment with different styles like modern , craftsman , traditional and etc.

[All-In-ONE PACKAGE]:Package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat & water fitting, high quality wax ring, floor bolts, and installation instruction, also Include special hand wrench tool to easily tighten the bolts in narrow spaces.

[CERTIFICATIONS]:Meets US UPC & Canada CSA standard product, High-efficiency, WaterSense Certified toilet - meet or exceed ANSI Z124.1 & ANSI A112-19.7;Products approved and meet the Massachusetts Plumbing & Gas Code.
body.description: WOODBRIDGE 1.0/1.6 GPF Dual Flush, High Efficiency Elongated All-In One Toilet with Soft Closed Seat, with Chrome Button T-0019-CH.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Dual Flush Toilet
reviews.reviewText: We purchased three of these to swap out with older toilets that were original to our home. This is a top of the line toilet and Woodbridge does a great job with everything from A to Z. The dual flush options are perfect for our family. The toilet is sleek and modern looking, but also use much less water so they will save us money in the long run.Two things to note: 1) the dual flush buttons were roughed in the wrong way, but were easily switched around to the appropriate side. 2) the toilet is very heavy and requires two person minimum, three person optimal to install.Overall I am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars like it, though the person installing it didn't
reviews.reviewText: I think that these one-piece modern toilets are nice and easy to clean, but the people we hired to install were not as happy, just b/c they are harder to install. We actually couldn't make this one fit in the bathroom we wanted it installed, but it worked in the other one (just barely). Frankly, however, I don't much care whether the installers have to work a little harder to install it, as I am paying them to do it. Just know that these are harder to install, and we almost had to send it back, b/c it wouldn't fit where we originally wanted to put it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Thus toilet looks modern has a great flush and easy to clean . Our previous toilet had the worst flush because of our water pressure is not that good.This toilet flushes very strong leaving the bowel clean. Cleaning The lower exterior is super easy because of the shape . Not like older toilets that you have to get on your knees to reach the different shape on the sides and bottom . This toilet is a fast easy clean .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely pleased with this purchase! UNTIL I WASN'T!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Updating a year later. The toilet itself, great. HOWEVER, 11 months after installing it, the slow close toilet seat stopped “slow closing”. At times, the lid would literally crash down when touched. I lifted the seat off its hinges and found a mass of clear, sticky “goo” all over one of the hinges, and all over the toilet beneath where it had been seated. I contacted the company, included a photo of the hinge covered with “goo”, and asked if there was a fix for this. The reply I got was borderline insulting… asking me to send a video showing that the seat wasn’t closing properly (as if I were lying, and as if the photo I’d sent wasn’t clear evidence that something was wrong with the hinge). I responded with the requested video (the seat crashing down, not slow closing). Next thing I get is a suggestion that I pay them $60 for a new toilet seat. So I can expect it to last less than a year AGAIN, and have to keep spending $60 to replace it? Frankly, while the toilet itself works great and looks great in our remodeled bathroom, I question the company’s commitment to customer service, when an inquiry like mine is treated as if I’m lying about a problem, and then tell me to pay for the correction to a problem that is obviously one of their own manufacture. If this is Woodbridge’s idea of “customer service” and standing behind their products, I’d be very careful and would think twice about buying from them in the future. Fingers crossed that this toilet lasts longer than a year or so… but now I’m concerned that it, too, might have a manufacturing defect, and if so, they’ll expect me to pay to replace it. I won’t… not with another Woodridge product. My suggestion to the company would be to hire customer service reps who believe their own eyes when presented with photo evidence of a problem, rather than further question the customer’s honesty. Never again. My original review from the time of installation a year ago follows:We couldn’t be more pleased with this purchase. I’ll admit, installing the toilet was a bit of a struggle (hence only 4 Stars on that point)… it takes two people to lower it into position, while at the same time trying to look down at the template on the floor… not particularly easy to do, and it took more than one try. On the first try, just slightly off-target, the weight of the toilet rested on one of the two brass bolts, and caused it to bend… so extra bolts were needed. Thankfully, we had extras. Also, we’d opted to use a universal gasket (Fluidmaster 7530P8 Universal Better Than Wax Toilet Seal, Wax-Free Toilet Bowl Gasket Fits Any Drain) rather than the included wax gasket — that turned out to be a smart move because otherwise we’d have had to replace the wax gasket after the failed first try in order to ensure a watertight seal. All that being said, once the toilet was in position, it was not at all difficult to use the included wrench to reach around from behind to tighten the nuts to the bolts. The benefit, of course, is the clean look of the skirted base (and for cleaning, there's nothing better!).We’d noted that some reviewers here on Amazon complained that the flush wasn’t strong enough. I strongly disagree. First of all, with the toilet in use here for more than a week, we’ve not found that to be an issue at all. Also, there are instructions included for how to adjust the force of the flush if necessary — we haven’t had to adjust it at all, as the factory pre-settings are perfectly adequate. It’s also quite quiet, and almost totally silent when the tank is refilling after a flush.As for the appearance of this new toilet, it’s a great addition to our bathroom remodel, and we’re very pleased. Another plus is the removable (and soft-closing!) toilet seat, which will make cleaning much, much easier. All in all, we’d recommend this to anyone looking for a stylish (and SKIRTED!) toilet. As for the negative reviews here, we’re glad we ignored them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, bumpy shipment
reviews.reviewText: The Woodbridge toilet works as expected and looks nice. However it was quite a journey to finally get it. The one I could install was the third I ordered. The first two were broken in shipment, I’m still in the process to get it returned and refunded. Scheduling a pickup was a pain, mine was rescheduled 5 times.I would be very hesitant to order a toilet from Amazon again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek gorgeous toilet
reviews.reviewText: Love my new toilet. It is really sleek, modern, and gorgeous!I love the syphonic flush, the half flush.Company was really professional at crediting me for the purchase of a new wax ring which came crushed.Suggestion to seller: Maybe secure wax ring elsewhere than at the bottom (hole) of toilet so it doesn't move thus crushed.Thank you :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toilet with a modern look
reviews.reviewText: Really happy with this purchase. I love the look, the dual flush is great. It flushes well. Easy to clean. I'd definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: No problems. Works well, looks modern, well worth the money.
